title: Jim Farley to Discuss Ford+ Plan for Growth, Value Creation, Shift to Digital EVs at Bernstein Conference on June 1
description: Ford President and CEO Jim Farley will participate in a fireside chat with technology analyst Toni Sacconaghi at the Alliance Bernstein 38th Annual Strategic Decisions Conference on Wednesday, June 1, 2022, at 10:00 a.m. ET.
